name: ITP - 497 - Anti Graffiti Protective Coatings
template name: ITP - 497 - Anti Graffiti Protective Coatings Rev 3

name: Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document Review
Conformance Criteria - Permit to Work, PTW # 1 Fall Prevention, Notify Worksafe NZ if required. Permit to Work around services (Gas, Power etc) if required.
Detail - Ensure that Sub-Contract and Supplier Agreements are signed
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document Review
Records - Subcontract and Supplier Aggrements via email.
Detail - Ensure all Sub-Contractors and suppliers go through a Downer Induction
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Induction
Conformance Criteria - Issued induction stickers and number
Records - Hazard ID and Pre-starts to safety team
Detail - Subcontractor to produce specification for the extent and frequency of testing for Design Engineer for approval
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document submission
Detail - Visual inspection to ensure it is dust free, clean and repaired prior to application.
○ Any fairing coat/grout that is used to achieve the F5 finish will need the required curing time as per product specification.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual inspection and Document review
Conformance Criteria - Ensure PCP and Snag List for the structure are both signed off
○ BBO sign off for Pre paint inspection to ensure F5 finish has been achieved
Detail - Collection of names, experience and qualifications of coating applicators
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document review
Detail - Design Engineer to be advised when painting is occuring so they can visit site and do a visual inspection
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Detail - Ensure the supplied paint system meets the requirements as per the specification. .
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document review
Conformance Criteria - NZTA S10 Approved paint system to be signed off by the Design Engineer
Detail - Confirmation of Design life not less than 10 years
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document review
Detail - Confirmation of cleaning product (to align with TDS) - Pressure washing of substrate no greater than 2700psi.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document review
Detail - Weather checks to be undertaken prior to starting coating
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual inspection and review of forecast
Conformance Criteria - No painting during Inclement weather such as rain, snow, fog, mist, pollution or dust or excessively high winds
Detail - Humidity and Temperature checks to be undertaken prior to starting coating. Also moisture check of substrate to be undertaken as per specification supplied.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual inspection and measurement

Conformance Criteria - No painting if the surface temperature is below 10 degrees or exceeds 32 degrees. Or the surface temperature drops to less than 3 degrees above the ambient dew point, Or humidity exceeds 85%. Or if moisture present.
Detail - Demonstration of substrate cleaned all dust, dirt and other surface contaminants must be removed. Using manufacturer’s approved surface cleaner
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review -
Detail - Demonstration of surface moisture conditions. - 1 test every 46m² or for every time painting
Frequency - Before painting (minimum 28 days after concrete, grout and fairing coat has cured)
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review -
Conformance Criteria - NZTA S/10 8.8 refers to ASTM D4263
○ Relative Humidity (Measured), Air Temperature (Measured), Surface Temperature (Measured), Dew Point (Calculated) Surface minus Dew Point (Calculated), Dry Surface (Visual Inspection)
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Measuring Devices
Detail - Ensure dust control throughout application and curing. Co-ordinate other site activites that may generate dust to stop until the paint is dry.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual inspection
Detail - Ensure subcontractor records the date, type, location and extent of all coatings
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Drawings
Detail - Recoating time as per manufacturers specifications, and weather conditions.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document Review
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - NZTA S10 Section 13.2
Conformance Criteria - DFT minimum of 100 microns
Records - IANZ Test Results or other approved
Detail - Post works inspection with BBO Sign Off
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Dry Film Thickness

Conformance Criteria - The completed paint system or coating shall be of uniform thickness, free of runs, sags, pinholes and bubbles, mudcracking, dry overspray, grit inclusion etc. All such imperfections shall be removed or made good to the satisfaction of the Design Engineer.
Detail - Ensure all OFIs are closed and included within QA file
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document Review
Detail - Delivery Dockets to be included in QA file
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document Review
Frequency - At the completion of the lot of work
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document Review
Detail - Red pen mark up drawings to be included in QA file
Frequency - At the completion of the Lot of work
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Drawings
